name: SHOOOTER!
description:
Controls:
A and D to move.
Space to jump.
click to SHOOOT!
R to restart the level.

I couldn't add health counter, but you can only take 4 bullets!

Note: You can shoot enemy bullets to break them.

The game was made for the United Game Jam 2020 it was made within 48 hours. Your objective is to fight your way thru and become 2 (which is the theme of the jam "Two"). You need to dodge, attack and kill enemies to progress.
